module.title: dia
module.p: dia is a masculine noun with the basic meaning god, deity.
As an adjective-compounding, noun-compounding and verb-compounding prefix –

ul.li: maslach [adjective] shameful, maslaich [verb] shame ⇒ dia-mhaslach blasphemous, dia-mhaslaich blaspheme
riaghail [verb] govern ⇒ riaghladh [noun] government ⇒ dia-riaghladh theocracy
